meanings.definition: Exceeding the usual, standard, or prescribed number.
meanings.sent1: The supernumerary stars in the sky made the night extra bright.
meanings.sent2: The supernumerary decorations on the tree made it look more festive.
meanings.sent3: The supernumerary toppings on the pizza made it a tower of deliciousness.
meanings.sent4: Her supernumerary energy levels seemed to defy all logic.
meanings.sent5: The supernumerary flowers in the garden created a magical atmosphere.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is in excess of the usual, standard, or prescribed number.
meanings.sent1: The play had a supernumerary actor who added depth to the scene.
meanings.sent2: The supernumerary books on the shelf overflowed onto the floor.
meanings.sent3: The party had a supernumerary of balloons, making it a colorful affair.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a supernumerary in the group, always standing out.
meanings.sent5: The supernumerary cookies on the plate disappeared in no time.
